meanings.definition: The act of unfolding or the state of being unfolded.
meanings.sent1: The unfoldment of the map revealed a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: The unfoldment of the flower petals was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the mysterious unfoldment of a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The unfoldment of the story's plot kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The gradual unfoldment of the mystery captivated the detective.

meanings.definition: The process of revealing or making known something previously hidden or unknown.
meanings.sent1: The unfoldment of the truth brought closure to the case.
meanings.sent2: The unfoldment of the surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected unfoldment of events left everyone in laughter.
meanings.sent4: The unfoldment of the conspiracy shocked the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The gradual unfoldment of the plan kept everyone in suspense.
